known_issues: GIF/Giphy avatar search is non-functional because the search logic is wired to useState initialization instead of an effect (useEffect), so no API call runs when the search term changes.

existing_features.title: Fix the Giphy search trigger in `frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDialog.tsx` so that searching runs when the debounced search term changes (replace the incorrect `useState(() => { ... })` side-effect usage with a proper `useEffect` tied to `debouncedSearchTerm`).

Prevent stale or out-of-order Giphy responses from overwriting newer search results in `AvatarPickerDialog` (e.g., ensure only the latest debounced search updates `giphyResults`/`giphyError`, and avoid setting state after the component unmounts).

projectName: Fix non-functional Giphy GIF search in AvatarPickerDialog
